name: Wonderland Blast
description:
The ultimate matching 2 puzzle game with cute friend Nova!

Join the fun adventure of Nova and help find the dreamy wonderland!

Match 2 or more cubes of the same color and clear the level in limited moves. But don’t forget your friend Nova! It’s not that easy to solve puzzles without its talent. Nova’s power will be your best helper while playing this such amazing game. Go ahead with Nova and discover its talented outfits such as Artemis, Davinci, Merlin and many more!
Crunch all the same colored cubes into combos by using numerous boosters as well.

FEATURE:
●Stunning graphic and unique gameplay;
●Over 100+ addictive levels and more curious updates;
●Marvelous Nova’s talents: Shooting, Shuffling, Painting and many more;
●Various boosters along the adventure: Nova Crush, Fastener Bomb, Vacuum Cleaner;
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses after levels passed;
● Easy to play but challenging to master;
● Play and compete with your Facebook friends;
● COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY!
publishers: Shanghai Joy Mania Network Technology Co
